alert.note: Alert for New Castle (Delaware) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 13 at 11:08AM EST until February 13 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow. Additional accumulations up to an inch or two. * WHERE...Kent County in Maryland, New Castle County in Delaware, and parts of central and southern New Jersey. * WHEN...Until 4:00 PM this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Expect slippery conditions on untreated roads and walkways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The snow is expected to gradually taper to flurries this afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use extra caution if driving. The latest road conditions for your state can be obtained by dialing 5 1 1.
